page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: In the Donisthorpe area 60 people were interviewed of which 14 were men,12 women,17 boys and 17 girls.The most popular recreation for boys was football,non organized football.Coin collecting was perhaps the most exceptional.Swimming was the most popular passtime for girls and the second for boys.7 girls listed musical instrument playing,compared with only 1 boy.Collecting ladybirds was the most unusual recreation amongst girls. More women favoured knitting to any other hobby.64% of women's passtimes were conducted in and around the home compared with 33% of mens.The men followed a wide variety of recreations,only 6 listed gardening as a hobby and only 3,watching T.V.One wonders,in conclusion,whether people have been selective in listing their hobbies.
